Articles.Content:
Just a quick question for anyone who knows..

How many Advanced SAS modules do I actually need on a craft? Do I need one at the top of every fuel stack or just one underneath the command module?

Cheers,

TJ
Only 1 ASAS. For SAS, it depends on how badly your ship handles.

Just the one ASAS, its basicly a computer that overrides enhances the crews flight inputs.

SAS should be placed around the center of gravity for best effect from what I have herd.

Damn it! I have been placing them at the top of every fuel stack in my Crafts XD..

Lol, thanks guys.
